name: Beat It (Auer)
description:
Beat It! - JamDNA 11

Controls:

Use left mouse button to align shot then hold to build up energy. Release in a variety of ways to achieve victory. 

Use mouse scroll to zoom in and out. 

Criteria #1 Shockwave Implementation-The player is moved by releasing focused bursts of energy. One of those being a powerful shockwave!
Assets

Background Music - http://freemusicarchive.org/

Sound Effects/ Text to Speech generated from - https://ttsreader.com/
